section.name: Request
section.p: In Hippo CMS, any request is an act of asking someone to perform an action. The most common request in Hippo is to request for a document to be published. This is a request from a contributor to an editor. The action that is requested of the editor is reviewing the document and pressing a button indicating that the document is to be published. Of course, the editor could also decide to deny the request. In Hippo CMS contributors have no button to indicate that a document should be published, only that it is ready to be published.

ul.li: If you are doing the tour, use the back button of your browser to continue. (There is no hyperlink here, because you can get here from many different pages.)
